Introduction

THE7 (Korean: 디 7; Japanese: ザ・セブン) is a 7-member Korean-Thai boy group under Ganada Entertainment. The Korean members (Yunmin, Woochul and Yongkwon) were announced on April 11, 2022, and the 4 Thai members were picked through the Thai survival show "SEVEN STARS". They made their debut on January 29, 2023, with the single, “GET LOOSE“.

On February 16, 2024 The7 took to social media to announce their fandom name as Sky, YOU ARE MY “SKY”.

On March 20, 2024 Granada Entertainment announced that the contract with all the members has ended and they will be taking a new path, eventually leading to THE7's disbanding.
